summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated August 13, 2021, containing attachments related to the case status and a legal document concerning Ghislaine Maxwell. It appears to be internal legal correspondence regarding the Maxwell prosecution.
locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 13, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email contains two attachments: 'Case_Status_Spreadsheet.xlsx' and 'Maxwell_RTC_vAll citecheck.docx'.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office at 1 Saint Andrews Plaza in New York, NY.
The attachments suggest ongoing legal work related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case, including case status tracking and legal citation checking.
The document is part of the Epstein case data set, indicating its relevance to the broader investigation.
